text: you know what they say there's no such
thing as a free lunch but there is such
thing as a free lunch recipe and you can
get all of our lunch recipes dinner
recipes and breakfast recipes in our
free app go to the App Store download
the everyday food app and then sign up
for a free subscription and you get all
the recipes in this little magazine 5
times a year the July issues out now so
you should totally check it out if you
don't have an iPad you can also get the
same recipes in the same little magazine
on our website at everyday food com you
should totally check it out because
there's lots of great recipes in here
some of the recipes from the videos and
some all-new check it out check it out
check it out it's free
